text: Jodi Balfour (born 29 October 1987) is a South African actress. She is known for her role as Gladys Witham in the Canadian television drama series Bomb Girls."Bomb Girls: Meg Tilly, Jodi Balfour return for Season 2 on Jan. 2" . Toronto Star, January 2, 2013. In 2019, she starred in the Apple TV+ space drama series For All Mankind.
